paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant 122 Val----Ile, including penetrance data and patient demographics.

patients.demographics: black individuals without overt cardiac disease

functional_data.summary: The variant is associated with cardiac amyloidosis but was not found in individuals without the disease.

variants.segregation_data: Not applicable as no affected individuals were found in the study.
variants.additional_notes: The study suggests that the variant is relatively common in the black population.
key_quotes: The MaeIII(-) gene frequency was 4/354 (1.1%; 95% confidence interval 0.32%2.7%), suggesting that the variant is relatively common in blacks.

extraction_metadata.notes: Full text provided, allowing for comprehensive extraction.
